items.sentence: It was the most frightening experience I've ever had.
I certainly had no idea that Tom was studying French.
Tom wasn't able to do anything he was supposed to do.
You shouldn't have come to school if you have a cold.
If dogs could talk, what do you think they'd tell us?
I can't just leave my dog at home when I go on trips.
Tom didn't give me everything he promised to give me.
Tom realized he couldn't play tennis as well as Mary.
I think that this will be the last battle of the war.
I think that you should break up with your boyfriend.
